paragraphs.name: c203
paragraphs.text: But hey, don’t worry about the facts. Didn’t we read somewhere that the Washington Post says “Trump’s climate plan might not be so bad after all?” They wouldn’t print that if it weren’t true, would they?

bad5f6af62a1.title: Joe Romm is the master of fake news, and has been for years.

paragraphs.name: 462f
paragraphs.text: Joe Romm is the master of fake news, and has been for years. I have been following Joe for years and it’s always good for a good laugh. I have never known him to say anything positive about the future climate, and he never gives any sort of reasoned rebuttal to any climate conclusion that is not catastrophic. Anything less then 100 percent…

d79c3fa0acc4.title: The mainstream media is really letting us down.

paragraphs.name: 0d80
paragraphs.text: The mainstream media is really letting us down. And the Washington Post tends to have a progressive view. On top of this, we have president elect who is trying to bully the major media outlets. Normalization of outrageous racism. Suggesting that science is a matter of opinion and that scientists are involved in some conspiracy. These will be the downfall of the USA.

3c54d18a04b2.title: Republicans believe in the “big bang” theory of how the world was created.

paragraphs.text: Republicans believe in the “big bang” theory of how the world was created. INow you get the idea of how out of touch the R are. They believe that “evolution” is “bunk”. Do you still want to call yourself a R??????????

14af8ef0ac6c.title: I urge people to take a look at Adam Curtis’ documentary — Hypernormalism 2016 of what is really…

paragraphs.name: f77e
paragraphs.text: I urge people to take a look at Adam Curtis’ documentary — Hypernormalism 2016 of what is really happening now! This isn’t about Fake News, but about how Russia and the US Trump News strategists are deploying content here now. Deploying news that destroys the ability to act or further divides people into growing isolation. Whole segments of society…

virtuals.subtitle: What is more important is that newspapers find a way to become financially viable in today’s media market. We as consumers of news must be…

d410763d2b46.title: I believe that the publisher of papers should make sure that their news articles are as accurate as…

content.subtitle: What is more important is that newspapers find a way to become financially viable in today’s media market. We as consumers of news must be…

paragraphs.text: I believe that the publisher of papers should make sure that their news articles are as accurate as possible. As for opinion articles, they are just that opinions. An it is the reader’s responsibility to weigh their value.
What is more important is that newspapers find a way to become financially viable in today’s media…

virtuals.subtitle: Sounds shockingly similar to Government sensors who need to “approve” content before it can be published there Joe.

e2868b1323ac.title: Okay, so you assert human beings are too stupid to know what an opinion piece is so media outlets…

content.subtitle: Sounds shockingly similar to Government sensors who need to “approve” content before it can be published there Joe.

paragraphs.name: b422
paragraphs.text: Okay, so you assert human beings are too stupid to know what an opinion piece is so media outlets need to “pre screen” opinion pieces to make sure they match up to the far left standards?

paragraphs.name: 104e
paragraphs.text: Sounds shockingly similar to Government sensors who need to “approve” content before it can be published there Joe.

4a52038cd710.title: Scientists need to take the lead, address the nation in primetime.

content.subtitle: Professional deniers in high places will get away with sowing disinformation & confusion as long as doubt remains in the public mind about…

paragraphs.name: a218
paragraphs.text: Scientists need to take the lead, address the nation in primetime.

paragraphs.name: 1bca
paragraphs.text: Professional deniers in high places will get away with sowing disinformation & confusion as long as doubt remains in the public mind about the scientific consensus and the hard evidence from all disciplines of the deep trouble we’re facing.

virtuals.subtitle: Running opinions that haven’t been fact-checked amounts to normalizing the fake news they decry.

7c4ad4309a83.title: Lomborg is not a climate denier or skeptic, but he has alternative views on what humanity’s…

paragraphs.name: edf6
paragraphs.text: Lomborg is not a climate denier or skeptic, but he has alternative views on what humanity’s response to climate change should be. Romm is doing a disservice to people interested in the ‘big picture’ solutions to the climate change problems facing the world by nit-picking a couple of Lomborg’s errors. Best for people to make their own mind up and…

d438c7ddf88c.title: You have to give Lomborg credit for managing to grift out a living by becoming a commentator re a…

paragraphs.name: e09e
paragraphs.text: You have to give Lomborg credit for managing to grift out a living by becoming a commentator re a field in which he has no academic credentials and has been demonstrated to be wrong again and again.

3c9dd0c43677.title: That actually implies that he has a plan, but it’s more of an anti-plan.

paragraphs.name: 4d40
paragraphs.text: That actually implies that he has a plan, but it’s more of an anti-plan.

415a67f80bc8.title: Hold on, not just the Washington Post.

paragraphs.name: 6c37
paragraphs.text: Hold on, not just the Washington Post. Saw a glowing article couple of months ago by Nicholas Kristof over at the NYT praising Lomborg. Even had his photograph taken with him. Lomborg convinced the University of Western Australia and the conservative Federal Govt, to open a science sceptic centre at the uni. Only public outcry prevented it from going on. He’s conning the world.
